content.prompt: The chart above proves which of the following?

choices.label: The population of Latin America is greater than that of the Middle East.
Latin America has a much older population than the Middle East does.
The female population of the four Latin American countries listed is greater than the male population.
In the countries of the Middle East the percentage of the population that is under 15 is in the majority.
The percentage of the population under 15 is greater in Latin America than it is in the Middle East.

topic.text: 9.1: Advances in Technology and Exchange after 1900

skill.text: Skill 5.A: Identify patterns among or connections between historical developments and processes.
